topCharacter.name: Goku
topCharacter.dialogue: This is gonna be SUPER! Let's blast off to your Jump issue!

bottomCharacter.name: Vegeta
bottomCharacter.dialogue: Tch. Go ahead and tell your birthdate.

topCharacter.name: Naruto Uzumaki
topCharacter.dialogue: Believe it! Your legendary Jump issue's out there, dattebayo!

bottomCharacter.name: Kakashi Hatake
bottomCharacter.dialogue: Yo. No need for a mask... unless you're hiding your birth year.

topCharacter.name: Monkey D. Luffy
topCharacter.dialogue: Shishishi! Let's sail to your birth year's Jump treasure!

bottomCharacter.name: Vinsmoke Sanji
bottomCharacter.dialogue: Tch. I usually serve food, not magazines—but I’ll make an exception for you.

topCharacter.name: Ichigo Kurosaki (Bankai)
topCharacter.dialogue: Bankai! Time to slice open your Jump issue from the past!

bottomCharacter.name: Rukia Kuchiki
bottomCharacter.dialogue: The Soul Society demands... your birth date. Now.

topCharacter.name: Izuku Midoriya (Full Cowl)
topCharacter.dialogue: Plus Ultra! Let’s trace back to your heroic first Jump!

bottomCharacter.name: Katsuki Bakugo
bottomCharacter.dialogue: You better not make me wait, nerd. Gimme the date!

topCharacter.name: Yuji Itadori
topCharacter.dialogue: This might get cursed, but we’re diggin’ up that Jump!

bottomCharacter.name: Satoru Gojo
bottomCharacter.dialogue: Relax, I’ve got six eyes and infinite style. That Jump issue’s as good as found.

topCharacter.name: Tanjiro Kamado
topCharacter.dialogue: Total Concentration Breathing: Form Zero — Birthdate Reveal!

bottomCharacter.name: Nezuko Kamado (in box)
bottomCharacter.dialogue: Mmph! Mmph! (Translation: I'm hyped to find it!)

topCharacter.name: Jotaro Kujo
topCharacter.dialogue: Yare yare daze... just spit out the date already.

bottomCharacter.name: Joseph Joestar (Young)
bottomCharacter.dialogue: Your next line is... 'No way! That’s my Jump issue?!'

topCharacter.name: Gon Freecss
topCharacter.dialogue: No matter what, I’ll hunt down that Jump!

bottomCharacter.name: Killua Zoldyck
bottomCharacter.dialogue: This’ll be a shocker—give me the date already.

topCharacter.name: L
topCharacter.dialogue: There’s an 80.2% chance your Jump issue is hidden in that birthdate.

bottomCharacter.name: Light Yagami
bottomCharacter.dialogue: Exactly as I planned... the Jump from the day your destiny began.
